column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A------ drunken military officer (unnamed) behind the wheel of a Landcruiser hit a 3 wheeler tuk tuk and crashed into a park.------This incident occurred at 12:30 am on July 2
column5: Chroy Changvar district.------According to a source
column6: the car plated RCAF 01.2.1366 hit the tuk tuk
column8: causing the 3 wheeler driver injuries.------After the incident
column9: the local authorities took both vehicles to the Traffic Police Office of Phnom Penh Capital Hall
